item.title: Hugo blog post workflow
item.description: This is the project setup Step 1: $ hugo new posts/<post_name>.md Step 2: Edit post and preview with $ hugo server -D Step 3: In blog post change draft to false Step 4: Run $ ./deploy.sh "Commit message" Step 5: Commit changes to public. In case of submodule errors check https://gist.github.com/myusuf3/7f645819ded92bda6677
